mapper.update: update technology.declare_award set d_name = #{dName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_status = #{dStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_Id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where d_Id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select d_Id, d_name, a_id, filename, d_status, c_Id from technology.declare_award
